tool.name: chromstaR change cutoff
tool.description: on posterior probabilities to adjust sensitivity of peak detection

param.name: changeWhat
param.label: Apply cutoff on which posterior?
param.option: Posteriors in each bin (will fragment peaks)
Maximium posterior in each peak (keeps broad peaks intact)

tool.help:
Options: -o CHROMSTAROBJECT, --chromstarObject=CHROMSTAROBJECT File with chromstaR object.
-w CHANGEWHAT, --changeWhat=CHANGEWHAT Function to use. Either 'changePostCutoff' or 'changeMaxPostCutoff'. Default is changeMaxPostInPeak.
-c CUTOFF, --cutoff=CUTOFF Cutoff to apply on the posteriors or maxPostInPeak. Default is 0.9999.
-h, --help Show this help message and exit
